verses.verse: When <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H853><s%> the nations, <S%H1471><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> <S%H853><s%> land <S%H776><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee, and thou succeedest <S%H3423><s%> them, and dwellest <S%H3427><s%> in their cities, <S%H5892><s%> and in their houses; <S%H1004><s%>

Thou shalt separate <S%H914><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> for thee in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thy land, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee to possess <S%H3423><s%> it.

Thou shalt prepare <S%H3559><s%> thee a way, <S%H1870><s%> and divide <S%H8027><s%> <S%H853><s%> the coasts <S%H1366><s%> of thy land, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth thee to inherit, <S%H5157><s%> into three parts, that every <S%H3605><s%> slayer <S%H7523><s%> may <S%H1961><s%> flee <S%H5127><s%> thither. <S%H8033><s%>

And this <S%H2088><s%> is the case <S%H1697><s%> of the slayer, <S%H7523><s%> which <S%H834><s%> shall flee <S%H5127><s%> thither, <S%H8033><s%> that he may live: <S%H2425><s%> Whoso <S%H834><s%> killeth <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> ignorantly, <S%H1907><s%> <S%H1947><s%> whom he <S%H1931><s%> hated <S%H8130><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> in time <S%H8032><s%> past; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8657><s%>

As when a man <S%H834><s%> goeth <S%H935><s%> into the wood <S%H3293><s%> with <S%H854><s%> his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> to hew <S%H2404><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> and his hand <S%H3027><s%> fetcheth a stroke <S%H5080><s%> with the axe <S%H1631><s%> to cut down <S%H3772><s%> the tree, <S%H6086><s%> and the head <S%H1270><s%> slippeth <S%H5394><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the helve, <S%H6086><s%> and lighteth upon <S%H4672><s%> <S%H853><s%> his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> that he die; <S%H4191><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> shall flee <S%H5127><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of those <S%H428><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> and live: <S%H2425><s%>

Lest <S%H6435><s%> the avenger <S%H1350><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> pursue <S%H7291><s%> <S%H310><s%> the slayer, <S%H7523><s%> while <S%H3588><s%> his heart <S%H3824><s%> is hot, <S%H3179><s%> and overtake <S%H5381><s%> him, because <S%H3588><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> is long, <S%H7235><s%> and slay <S%H5221><s%> him; <S%H5315><s%> whereas he was not <S%H369><s%> worthy of death, <S%H4941><s%> <S%H4194><s%> inasmuch as <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> hated <S%H8130><s%> him not <S%H3808><s%> in time <S%H8032><s%> past. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8543><s%>
Wherefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> thee, saying, <S%H559><s%> Thou shalt separate <S%H914><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> for thee.

And if <S%H518><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> enlarge <S%H7337><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy coast, <S%H1366><s%> as <S%H834><s%> he hath sworn <S%H7650><s%> unto thy fathers, <S%H1><s%> and give <S%H5414><s%> thee <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he promised <S%H1696><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> unto thy fathers; <S%H1><s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H2063><s%> commandments <S%H4687><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> them, which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day, <S%H3117><s%> to love <S%H157><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> and to walk <S%H1980><s%> ever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%> in his ways; <S%H1870><s%> then shalt thou add <S%H3254><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> for thee, beside <S%H5921><s%> these <S%H428><s%> three: <S%H7969><s%>

That innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> be not <S%H3808><s%> shed <S%H8210><s%> in <S%H7130><s%> thy land, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee for an inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> and so blood <S%H1818><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thee.

But if <S%H3588><s%> any man <S%H376><s%> hate <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8130><s%> his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> and lie in wait <S%H693><s%> for him, and rise up <S%H6965><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him, and smite <S%H5221><s%> him mortally <S%H5315><s%> that he die, <S%H4191><s%> and fleeth <S%H5127><s%> into <S%H413><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of these <S%H411><s%> cities: <S%H5892><s%>

Then the elders <S%H2205><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%> shall send <S%H7971><s%> and fetch <S%H3947><s%> him thence, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> and deliver <S%H5414><s%> him into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the avenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood, <S%H1818><s%> that he may die. <S%H4191><s%>

Thine eye <S%H5869><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> pity <S%H2347><s%> <S%H5921><s%> him, but thou shalt put away <S%H1197><s%> the guilt of innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> from Israel, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3478><s%> that it may go well <S%H2895><s%> with thee.

Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> remove <S%H5253><s%> thy neighbor's <S%H7453><s%> landmark, <S%H1366><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they of old time <S%H7223><s%> have set <S%H1379><s%> in thine inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou shalt inherit <S%H5157><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee to possess <S%H3423><s%> it.

One <S%H259><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> rise up <S%H6965><s%> against a man <S%H376><s%> for any <S%H3605><s%> iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> or for any <S%H3605><s%> sin, <S%H2403><s%> in any <S%H3605><s%> sin <S%H2399><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he sinneth: <S%H2398><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of two <S%H8147><s%> witnesses, <S%H5707><s%> or <S%H176><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of three <S%H7969><s%> witnesses, <S%H5707><s%> shall the matter <S%H1697><s%> be established. <S%H6965><s%>
If <S%H3588><s%> a false <S%H2555><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> rise up <S%H6965><s%> against any man <S%H376><s%> to testify <S%H6030><s%> against him that which is wrong; <S%H5627><s%>

Then both <S%H8147><s%> the men, <S%H376><s%> between whom <S%H834><s%> the controversy <S%H7379><s%> is, shall stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> and the judges, <S%H8199><s%> which <S%H834><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> in those <S%H1992><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%>

And the judges <S%H8199><s%> shall make diligent inquisition: <S%H1875><s%> <S%H3190><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> if the witness <S%H5707><s%> be a false <S%H8267><s%> witness, <S%H5707><s%> and hath testified <S%H6030><s%> falsely <S%H8267><s%> against his brother; <S%H251><s%>

Then shall ye do <S%H6213><s%> unto him, as <S%H834><s%> he had thought <S%H2161><s%> to have done <S%H6213><s%> unto his brother: <S%H251><s%> so shalt thou put the evil away <S%H1197><s%> <S%H7451><s%> from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> you.

And those which remain <S%H7604><s%> shall hear, <S%H8085><s%> and fear, <S%H3372><s%> and shall henceforth <S%H3254><s%> commit <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> any <S%H1697><s%> such <S%H2088><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you.

And thine eye <S%H5869><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> pity; <S%H2347><s%> but life <S%H5315><s%> shall go for life, <S%H5315><s%> eye <S%H5869><s%> for eye, <S%H5869><s%> tooth <S%H8127><s%> for tooth, <S%H8127><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> for hand, <S%H3027><s%> foot <S%H7272><s%> for foot. <S%H7272><s%>
